snippet: A lamp his mother made as “kind of a joke” inspired the young Jonathan Adler, who now designs Modernist housewares.
abstract: Housewares designer Jonathan Adler describes how a lamp his mother made from plastic foam cups when he was a child inspired his own cynical yet sincere design sensibility.
lead_paragraph: A lamp his mother made as “kind of a joke” inspired the young Jonathan Adler, who now designs Modernist housewares.

headline.seo: Jonathan Adler’s Guiding Light: His Mother
headline.main: His Guiding Light? Mom, of Course
headline.print_headline: His Guiding Light? Mom, of Course
